original_text: There were 6,200 males in that list. They were one month old or older when Moses counted them.
korean_text: 그 계수된 자 곧 일 개월 이상 된 남자는 모두 육천이백 명이며

sentences.original_text: There were 6,200 males in that list.
They were one month old or older
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 달 이상 된 사람이었습니다.
